titleStmt.title: Peace and rest for the upright being a sermon preached at the funeral of the Reverend Dr. John Bryan, sometime minister of Trinity in Coventry / by that worthy preacher of Gods Word, Mr. Nath. Wanley ...
titleStmt.author: Wanley, Nathaniel, 1634-1680.
